message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a little too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,000?
I'm not quite ready to give up yet. I can do $11,500, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your position, Alice.  $10,500 is my final offer.  If you can't do that, I'll have to consider other options.
I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but that's my final offer. If you don't take it, I'm moving on.
